mapper.select: select a.*,b.class_name,c.user_name as coachName,SUM(d.complete_time is not null) as completeSections from usertrainitem as a INNER join classinfo as b on a.class_id = b.class_id INNER JOIN userinfo as c on a.coach_id = c.id left join usertrainplansection as d on a.user_trainitem_id = d.user_trainitem_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.coach_id = #{coachId} GROUP BY a.user_trainitem_id
